1.0.name: wordpress/wp-wiki-userprofile
1.0.description:
This plugin is used to grab Wikipedia user contribution to wordpress blog. This plugin is intracted with Media Wiki API using CURL request.

Plugin Features

  • Widget Support
  • Shortcode support

Shortcode Usage

*[wikiuser]

*[wikiuser param="editcount"]

*[wikiuser username="xxx" param="editcount"]
